text: my name is neelam koshia i am a
solutions architect at aws i'm
passionate about women in technology or
any other field where they are not many
women i was one of the founder of women
at sa group the way we started was we
just did a survey within the
organization to find out if there is a
need for any such group overwhelmingly
the response was like we need something
like that initially it started as an
internal group within aws but now we are
starting to do many events for customer
facing for the outside world to know
about how women and non-binaries can
serve themselves empower them and you
know help them grow at aws
our main goal is to have a
non-judgmental environment where they
can be free to talk about the challenges
that they have in the field in their
careers the biggest evidence which
showcases that you know amazon is really
driving towards inclusion diversity is
it's covering the whole range from the
grass loot to the top we have full
support from all the senior leadership
and that's why i feel that this is the
place where we don't just talk about you
know inclusion but we are actually
living inclusion diversity and equity
here this is the place to be
